title: Ownership and personal use of laptop/netbook computers 2012 , by country
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
Country Italy has the highest Percentage of population and United States has the lowest Percentage of population.
Country Italy has 1.18 times more Percentage of population than Country United States which is has the lowest.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
The highest Country Italy has 12.0 more Percentage of population than the lowest Country United States.
The Country Italy has the highest Percentage of population, followed by United Kingdom, and Germany. Down to the Country United States which is the lowest.
Country Australia, and Spain have a similar Percentage of population that is 71.0.
Considered together, the average Percentage of population in all 8 Countrys is roughly 72.38.
